name: Out of controls- fixed version
description:
Controls:

w/a/d or arrow keys to use specific hotbar slots.

'r' key to restart current level

'escape' to quit to main menu

This game was originaly created for the  48 hour 'Game Makers Toolkit' Game Jam 2020 (Here you can play it: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020/rate/699204).

Note: This game is in a very early development stage. But we will work on it and maybe even release it!
